Function reference

Main Functions

lav_betaselect()
Standardize Coefficients in a 'lavaan'-Model
lm_betaselect() glm_betaselect() print(<lm_betaselect>) print(<glm_betaselect>) raw_output()
Standardize Coefficients in a Regression Model

Helper Functions

std_data()
Standardize Selected Variables

Methods

print(<lav_betaselect>)
Print a 'lav_betaselect' Object
anova(<lm_betaselect>) anova(<glm_betaselect>)
ANOVA Tables For 'lm_betaselect' and 'glm_betaselect' Objects
coef(<lm_betaselect>) coef(<glm_betaselect>)
Coefficients of Beta-Select in Linear Models
confint(<lm_betaselect>) confint(<glm_betaselect>)
Confidence Interval for 'lm_betaselect' or 'glm_betaselect' Objects
getCall(<lm_betaselect>) getCall(<glm_betaselect>)
Call in an 'lm_betaselect' or 'glm_betaselect' Object
predict(<lm_betaselect>)
Predict Method for an 'lm_betaselect' Object
summary(<lm_betaselect>) print(<summary.lm_betaselect>)
Summary of an 'lm_betaselect'-Class Object
vcov(<lm_betaselect>) vcov(<glm_betaselect>)
The 'vcov' Method for 'lm_betaselect' and glm_betaselect Objects
predict(<glm_betaselect>)
Predict Method for a 'glm_betaselect' Object
summary(<glm_betaselect>) print(<summary.glm_betaselect>)
Summary of an 'glm_betaselect'-Class Object
